headline: Show HS: DevToys â€“ A Swiss Army Knife for Developers
description:
Hi,

In my spare time, I develop https://devtoys.app, a free and open-source offline Windows app that helps developers in daily tasks.

I just released version 1.0.9.0 on Microsoft Store and Chocolatey.

# New Features

* CRON Parser! * XML Validator! * Color Picker and Contrast!

# Improvements

* Added and updated many translations * New option in JSON Formatter, Hash Generator and Settings * Consistent font everywhere * Start-up performance

# Bug Fixes

* Inconsistencies in YAML to JSON Converter and JSON Formatter

Full changelog: https://github.com/veler/DevToys/releases/tag/v1.0.9.0

Feedback appreciated
